hero.ntitle: Hire freelancers who work like co-founders.

cardcont.1text: Hire highly-qualified and reliable Cuba-based freelancers offering services via their Slyks.
cardcont.2text: QvaPay makes it easy to pay Cuba-based freelancers. No registration needed, just pay with crypto or popular e-wallets.
cardcont.3text: Freemance is a coin-powered community of independent freelancers.
cardcont.4text: Join the Freemance coin-powered community and earn $FRE by helping us grow.

applayout.descsection1: Hire high-quality freelancers from Cuba. Easy, compliant payments.
applayout.descsection3: All profiles are vetted by the Freemance community

faq.question1-ancla2: What is a Minimum Viable Slyk
faq.answer1-ancla2: A Minimum Viable Slyk (MVS) is a Slyk with: A -30 seconds intro video, a catalog with at least one item on sell and a minimum of 30 registered users on your Slyk.
faq.answer1: Freemance is a directory of Cuban professionals with presence on Slyk. With Freemance you can access to their portfolios and hire their services through their virtual stores on Slyk.
faq.answer2: No, Freemance only works as a directory, listing and organizing by categories the freelancers’ profiles. Freemance does not charge commissions to the contractor nor the freelancer. Payments are done through Slyk.
faq.question3: Does Freemance influence in the price of the services
faq.answer3: No, the price of the services offered by the professionals listed on Freemance is an exclusive decision of them. These may vary depending on the agreement made with the contractor.
faq.answer4: No, payments are made exclusively on the freelancers’ Slyk virtual store. Freemance does not have any access to that data.
faq.question5: Could I pay with my credit card or they just accept cryptocurrency
faq.answer5: Payment methods are an exclusive decision of the freelancers and it is shown on their Slyk virtual store.
faq.answer7: Yes, Freemance has checked and approved every profile on the directory list.
faq.question8: How many professionals can I hire
faq.answer8: You can hire as many professionals as you estimate for your project.

privacy_policy.introduction: Freemance implements the guidelines, standards, controls and actions established by the data protection legislation where it operates, in particular the General Data Protection Regulation – GDPR – of the European Union and the General Data Protection Law – LGPD. This privacy and data protection policy explains how our organization uses the personal data we collect from you when you use our platform and applications.
privacy_policy.answer1: We collect information whenever you register on our site, fill out a form or browse the site. Freemance collects the following data:
privacy_policy.answer1-1-1: Contact and registration information: name, email address, mailing address, phone number, account username and password.
privacy_policy.answer1-1-2: Identification and demographic data: CPF, ID, nationality, date of birth, data needed to process payments and withdrawals, only for that purpose.
privacy_policy.answer1-1-3: User-generated content: photos, videos, audios and other information you may provide us through the use of the Freemance platform.
privacy_policy.answer1-1-4: Survey and feedback: Comments provided by you, as user of the platform, through online forms, email and/or surveys.
privacy_policy.answer1-2Title: 1.2. Data we automatically collect from you and/or your device:
privacy_policy.answer1-2-1: Your device information and identifiers: IP address, browser type and language, operating system, platform type, device type and application identifiers.
privacy_policy.answer1-2-2: Connection and use: domain names, browsing history, advertisements viewed, forms or form fields you complete in whole or in part, logs and other similar information.
privacy_policy.answer1-2-3: Geolocation: City, State or Country associated with your IP address or derived from your Wi-Fi triangulation. We ask for your permission before using your precise location based on your device's GPS functionality.
privacy_policy.answer1-3Title: 1.3. Information we collect from third parties:
privacy_policy.answer1-3-1: Information from public and commercial sources: contact and demographic information, information about individuals using the same device.
privacy_policy.answer1-3-3: Social media information: When you interact with us through a social media service or log in with your social media credentials, we may have access to your social media information, such as your name and email address.
privacy_policy.answer1-4Title: 1.4. Additional information we collect for commercial purposes only:
privacy_policy.answer1-4-1: Business contact information: company name, your name, email address and position held.
privacy_policy.answer1-4-2: Due diligence information: ID, sometimes social network, contact information, nationality, position held, age, gender, date of birth or country of residence.
privacy_policy.question2: 2. How do we collect your data?
privacy_policy.answer2: 2.1. You provide Freemance with most of the data we collect directly. We collect and process data when you:
privacy_policy.answer2-1: Register on our platform, make payments and/or use one of our services. Voluntarily complete a survey or provide information and feedback us via email. Use or view our platform through your browser's cookies.
privacy_policy.answer2-2Title: Freemance may also receive your data indirectly from the following sources:
privacy_policy.question3: 3. How do we use your data?
privacy_policy.answer3: 3.1. Any of the information we collect from you can be used in one of the following ways:
privacy_policy.answer3-1: To customize your experience(your information helps us better respond to your individual needs).
privacy_policy.answer3-2: To improve our website: We continue to strive to improve the offerings on our website, based on the information and feedback we receive from you.
privacy_policy.answer3-4: To administer a contest, promotion, survey or other site feature.
privacy_policy.answer3-5: To send periodic emails: The email address you provide for payment processing may be used to send you information or updates regarding your requests and to occasionally receive institutional news, updates, and product-related information or service purchased, etc.
privacy_policy.answer3-6: Note: If you wish to unsubscribe from receiving future emails at any time. We include detailed unsubscribe instructions at the end of each email.
privacy_policy.question4: 4. How do we store your data?
privacy_policy.answer4-1: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you submit a payment, log in, send or access your personal information.
privacy_policy.answer4-2: We offer the use of a secure server. All confidential/credit information provided is transmitted via Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology and then encrypted into our database for access only by authorized persons with special access rights to our systems, to whom is mandatory the confidentiality of the information.
privacy_policy.answer5-1: We may send you information about our services that we think you might like.
privacy_policy.answer5-2: If you have agreed to receive marketing, you can always choose not receive it at a later date.
privacy_policy.answer5-3: You have the right at any time to prevent Freemance from contacting you for marketing purposes.
privacy_policy.answer5-4: If you no longer wish to be contacted for marketing purposes, please change your email notification settings in your platform account, see how-to guidelines here.
privacy_policy.question6: 6. What are your data protection rights?
privacy_policy.answer6-1Title: Freemance would like to make sure that you are fully aware of all your data protection rights. Each user is entitled to the following:
privacy_policy.answer6-2: Right of access: You have the right to ask Freemance for copies of your personal data. We may charge a small fee for this service.
privacy_policy.answer6-3: The right to rectify: You have the right to ask Freemance to correct any information you believe is incorrect. You also have the right to ask Freemance to fill in information you believe is incomplete.
privacy_policy.answer6-4: The right to delete: You have the right to request Freemance to delete your personal data, under certain conditions.
privacy_policy.answer6-5: The right to restrict processing: You have the right to request Freemance to restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
privacy_policy.answer6-6: Right to object processing: You have the right to object the processing of your personal data by Freemance under certain conditions.
privacy_policy.answer6-7: The right to data portability: You have the right to request that Freemance transfer the data we collect to another organization, or directly to you under certain conditions.
privacy_policy.answer6-8: The right not to be subjected to automated decisions: You have the right to request the review of decisions made solely on the basis of automated processing of personal data that affect your interests, including decisions designed to define personal, professional, consumer, credit profile or personality aspects.
privacy_policy.note6: If you make a request, we have up 30 days to respond. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us at our email address: privacy@Freemance.com
privacy_policy.answer7: Cookies are small files that a website or its service provider transfers to your computer's hard drive via your web browser –if you allow it. These files allow the websites or systems of service providers to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information.
privacy_policy.answer8: We use cookies to help us remember and process your payments, understand and store your preferences for future visits, and compile aggregated data about site traffic and interactions so we can provide you with a better interaction and tools in the future. We may engage third-party service providers to help us better understand our website visitors. These service providers are not authorized to use the information collected on our behalf, except to help us conduct and improve our business.
privacy_policy.question9: 9. What types of cookies do we use?
privacy_policy.answer9Title: There are several different types of cookies, however our website uses:
privacy_policy.answer9-1: Functionality: We use cookies so that we can recognize you on our platform and remember your previously selected preferences. This can include your preferred language and location. A combination of first-party and third-party cookies is used.
privacy_policy.answer9-2: Advertising: We use cookies to collect information about your visit to our platform, the content you viewed, the links you followed and information about your browser, device and IP address. Freemance sometimes shares some limited aspects of this data with third parties for advertising purposes. We may also share online data collected through cookies with our advertising partners. This means that when you visit another website, advertising may be displayed based on your browsing patterns on our website.
privacy_policy.answer10: You can set your browser not to accept cookies, and the website above tells you how to remove cookies from your browser. However, in some cases, as a result some of the features on our website may not work properly.
privacy_policy.answer11: From time to time, at our discretion, we may include or offer third-party products or services on our website. These third party websites have separate and independent privacy policies. We therefore have no responsibility or liability with respect to the content and activities of these linked sites. However, we seek to protect the integrity of our website and welcome any feedback on these websites.
privacy_policy.answer11-1: Our privacy and data protection policy only applies to our website, so if you click on a link to another website, you should read the privacy policy.
privacy_policy.answer12-1: If we decide to modify our privacy policies, we will post the changes made on this page and/or update the Privacy and Data Protection Policy modification date.
privacy_policy.answer12-2: The last modifications to these policies were made on September 22nd, 2021.
privacy_policy.answer13-1: If you have any questions regarding our privacy and data protection policy, the data we keep about you; or if you would like to exercise one of your data protection rights, please do not hesitate to contact us.
privacy_policy.answer13-2: You can contact our Data Protection Officer (“DPO”) by sending an email to: privacy@freemance.com
